dcterms:creator: E. Dinan
S. Roller
K. Shuster
A. Fan
M. Auli
J. Weston
dcterms:description: The WoW dataset consists of dialogues where the wizard has access to knowledge retrieved from Wikipedia to generate informative responses, while the apprentice prefers common utterances. It includes 22,311 dialogues with 201,999 turns, divided into training, validation, and test sets.
dcterms:title: WoW

dcterms:creator: N. Moghe
S. Arora
S. Banerjee
M. M. Khapra
dcterms:description: The Holl-E dataset is designed to exploit background knowledge for building conversation systems, primarily focusing on movie-related dialogues.
dcterms:title: Holl-E

dcterms:creator: K. Zhou
S. Prabhumoye
A. W. Black
dcterms:description: The CMU_DoG dataset is created for document grounded conversations, focusing on dialogues that are informed by external documents.
dcterms:title: CMU_DoG
